page.title: 07BREAKDANCING
page.content: Breakdancing is a new kind of dancing. It started in about 1980-81. There are lots of different moves and some of them are very difficult. They have weird names like the 'Windmill','Crazy Legs'and the'Turtle'. You get special music to breakdance to and it has a good beat. The music is mostly produced from an electronic synthesiser. Ordinary dancing is normally done on the feet using different moves but staying with your weight on your feet. Breakdancing though, is a completely different matter. It is mostly done on the floor distributing the weight onto different parts of the body.
